Class BaseboardChoiceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eteks.sweethome3d.viewcontroller.BaseboardChoiceController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class BaseboardChoiceController
extends Object
implements Controller
    A MVC controller for baseboard choice view.

    5.0
    Author:
    Emmanuel Puybaret
